result.ga: An féidir leat an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: An féidir leat an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: An féidir leat an fhadhb a réiteachCan you solve the problem?
result.ponchtml: An féidir leat an ḟaḋb a réiteaċCan you solve the problem?

result.ga: Caithfidh muid an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Caithfidh muid an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Caithfidh muid an fhadhb a réiteachWe must solve the problem.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ muid an ḟaḋb a réiteaċWe must solve the problem.

result.eng: He didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
result.ga: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Níor chreid sé a fhusacht a bhí sé an fhadhb a réiteachHe didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
result.ponchtml: Níor ċreid sé a ḟusaċt a ḃí sé an ḟaḋb a réiteaċHe didn't believe how easy it was to solve the problem.
